DOC.brief_summary: Participants study receive two oral dos 150 milligram ( mg ) LY2157299 take least 4 day apart . One dose give without food . One dose give high fat meal . The study evaluate effect high fat meal much drug get blood stream . Side effect document . This study last approximately 15 day include screening . Screening require within 30 day prior start study .
